activity_data.blockers_risks: - Special order app is prompting for payment, blocking testing. - Confusion about the Amazon project status. - Registry signup flow errors affecting user onboarding. - Potential scope ambiguity around Blue Link new status and partial fulfillments.
activity_data.key_achievements: - 2 tickets completed, enabling progress on current issues. - 6 new tickets created to capture follow-on work. - Decisions to explore partial fulfillments on Blue Link and to investigate the special-order app payment requirement. - Initiation of migration/workstream from Algolia to Searchspring. - Agreement to clarify Amazon project status and registry report status.
activity_data.next_steps: - Confirm Amazon project status with Thomas (owners: Mike Samimi and Jessica Dutton). - Decide on pursuing Blue Link partial fulfillments (Jessica Dutton to coordinate). - Investigate and resolve the special-order-app payment requirement and define testing approach. - Check registry report update status and address sign-up flow errors. - Align on Blue Link new status necessity and timeline; schedule follow-up review.

# SUBS - Weekly Status Update
**Period:** 2025-09-17 to 2025-09-24 (7 days)

## 📊 Progress Summary
During the period one project meeting was held. 2 tickets were completed and 6 new tickets created, with 0 hours logged. Completed work included Hero Rotating Banner adjustments for mobile and initiating Move from Algolia to Searchspring; discussions covered Amazon project status, Blue Link partial fulfillments, registry report issues, sign-up flow, and a potential new status for Blue Link and a paid special-order app.

## 🎯 Key Achievements

## 📋 Meeting Action Items
• **Follow up on Amazon project**: Mike Samimi and Jessica Dutton need to clarify the status of the Amazon project with Thomas. (Assignee: Mike Samimi, Jessica Dutton)
• **Investigate partial fulfillments on Blue Link**: Jessica Dutton needs to connect with the team to see if partial fulfillments on Blue Link is something they want. (Assignee: Jessica Dutton)
• **Follow up on Ticket 5 17**: Jessica Dutton needs to look into the issue with the special order app requiring payment. (Assignee: Jessica Dutton)
• **Check on registry report update**: Mike Samimi needs to check the status of the registry report update. (Assignee: Mike Samimi)


## 🚧 Meeting Discussion Points
• The special order app is now asking for payment, which is blocking testing.
• There is confusion about the status of the Amazon project.
• There is an issue where a lot of people get an error after signing up during the registry flow.
